Latter Days is a very, VERY independent movie. And compared to many of today's more modern films, it's lacking on many parts. The shooting budget was very cheap and the overall movie has an amateurish quality to it. Casting wise, the acting is almost painful looking at it from a big studio perspective. Still... all that aside one needs to appreciate Latter Days for what it really is not - something for everyone.

If you are a fan of Zorro, Indiana Jones, or action in general this is a must-see. Directed by Republic's ace team of William Witney and John English and starring John Carroll as the title character.
